text: Asturias Airport is an airport in Asturias. It is located in the municipality of Castrillón, and is near to Avilés. It is operated by Aena. == Destinations == Airlines Destinations Air Europa Fuerteventura, Gran Canaria, Lanzarote, Tenerife-South EasyJet Geneva, Lisbon, London-Stansted Iberia Madrid Iberia Regional Air Nostrum Madrid, Seville, Valencia, Paris Ryanair Barcelona, Madrid Volotea Ibiza (starts 15 June 2012), Malaga (starts 15 June 2012) Vueling Barcelona, Paris-Orly (starts 23 June 2012) ==References== == Other websites == *Official Website Category:Airports in Spain Airport
title: Asturias Airport
